tool_description: Generates creative content ideas and themes for social media posts based on industry trends, target audience, and campaign objectives.

industry.description: The business industry or niche for content creation

target_audience.description: Primary demographic and psychographic description of target audience

campaign_objective.description: Main goal: brand_awareness, engagement, lead_generation, sales, or community_building

content_pillars.description: Key themes or topics to focus on

trending_topics.description: Include current trending topics and hashtags

error_messages: Invalid campaign objective: Use one of [brand_awareness, engagement, lead_generation, sales, community_building]
Empty industry or target_audience: Provide detailed descriptions for both fields
Content pillars array too large: Maximum 10 content pillars allowed
usage: Specify your industry, target audience, and campaign objective. Optionally provide content pillars and enable trending topics. Returns a list of creative content ideas with themes and suggested approaches.

content_ideas.description: List of creative content ideas and concepts

themes.description: Overarching themes for the content ideas

content_types.description: Recommended content formats for each idea
